body_html:
I believe I had to set the property in cmake: CUDNN_HOME. I also set it as an environment variable. For example, my entry is:

CUDNN_HOME = C:/Program Files/NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit/CUDNN/5.1/cuda
body_text:
I believe I had to set the property in cmake: CUDNN_HOME. I also set it as an environment variable. For example, my entry is:
CUDNN_HOME = C:/Program Files/NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit/CUDNN/5.1/cuda
body:
I believe I had to set the property in cmake: CUDNN_HOME. I also set it as an environment variable. For example, my entry is:

CUDNN_HOME = C:/Program Files/NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit/CUDNN/5.1/cuda
